title: Flask of Party
summaries: The Flask of Party is a flask that causes melee weapons and whips(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) to create bursts of confetti when hitting enemies. The confetti is purely cosmetic and does not provide damage bonuses. Melee weapons that fire projectiles will also create confetti when the projectiles hit enemies (except for the Flairon's bubbles).

The Flask of Party cannot be used in conjunction with other flasks, and using it will remove any existing flask effects. (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Like all other flasks, the effect will not be canceled when the player dies.
